name: AI People
storyline: In AI People everybody can create their own story with unique AI-driven NPCs, which are powered by Large-Language-Models with Long-Term-Memory. Players can write their own scenarios and also characteristics of each character. Therefore you can have conversation with your favorite historical figure, movie character etc. Because our NPCs think and feel, each iteration is different and unique.
summary: AI People is a sandbox game where you create and play your own scenarios with unique AI-powered NPCs that learn and interact based on your decisions. Their behavior is not scripted and their Large-Language-Models with Long-Term-Memory allows them to really think, feel and feel alive.
